alert.note: Alert for Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Cascades in Lane County; South Willamette Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued October 20 at 4:33AM PDT until October 20 at 10:00AM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PDT THIS MORNING BELOW 3000 FEET IN ELEVATION... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in areas of dense fog and smoke. * WHERE...South Willamette Valley including the Eugene metro area, as well as the Lane County Cascade and foothill valleys below roughly 3000 feet. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility varies dramatically throughout the advisory area. Drivers should be prepared for sudden changes in visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Cascades in Lane County; South Willamette Valley
